name: Glitch Jumper
description:
This game was made for the Game Off 2021 Game Jam.

The game is about a game, where the developer actively watches his work crumble slowly.

The game was made in a team of two, all assets have been created by us.

Controls: 

  • Move - WASD
  • Dash - Shift
  • Reset - Backspace
  • Pause - Escape
